Index Languagephysical and financial powerNonPrivilegedpst Elizabeth I have attached the index language we are currently using in confirmation letters The Megawatt Daily Index language in the above attachment is used for Cinergy and Comed the delivery points are not listed in the example Let me know if you need anything else Thanks Melissa

Payment Language on Financial Power Confirms Cc Sara It has been brought to my attention that the payment language we are using for financial power trades that are less than one month in duration does not mention that payment is due business days after the floating price is determinable It basically says business days after the last day of the month The fifth th Business Day following the date on which the Floating Price is determinable this language is in all confirms with a calculation period of one month or longer The fifth th Business Day following the last day of the month that includes the Calculation Period this language is in all confirms with a calculation period less than one month Can you draft payment language for trades less than one month that states payment is due five business days after the floating price is determinable Call me if you would like to discuss Thanks Melissa

RE Terminated Transactions Reconciliation between Master Log Power Physical spreadsheet and Other Cc PST Stacey I have reviewed the section on the attachment of counterparties on the master log with a Y but not on the physical power terminated list BP Energy Company is on the physical power terminated list With the exception of the four new companies that appeared on the master list today and Ameren we do not have any trades flowing after December with the other counterparties I have not been including counterparties on the list if we dont have any deals flowing December on out If I need to include companies that we dont have outstanding trades with let me know Niagara Mohawk has been purchased by Select Energy New York Inc Tonight Global Counterparty is going to replace the Niagara Mohawk name with Select Energy New York Inc I have been waiting on global before adding Select to the termination list I have not heard back on Ameren yet Once I have an answer from David on the other terminations by alternate source I will let you know Thanks for organizing the information from all of the emails Let me know if you need anything else I will be sending an updated physical power termination list today Thanks Melissa Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Friday January PM To Murphy Melissa Ann Portz David Cc Reeves Leslie Theriot Kim S Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Subject Terminated Transactions Reconciliation between Master Log Power Physical spreadsheet and Other Please review and let me know if I have misrepresented any counterparties If you want me to add comments send them to me and I will incorporate Thanks Stacey David Just to make sure you know the Power Physical Terminated Transactions spreadsheet is put together by Melissa from information she has received from Master Log and other This is our primary source for moving transactions into the bankruptcy book as she review to ensure that the contracts terminated cover all our trades Thanks Stacey File Termination Reconciliationxls
